{{also|praxis}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|grc|de}} {{m|grc|πρᾶξις}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈpʁaksɪs/}} * {{audio|de|De-Praxis.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Praxen}} # [[practice]], [[praxis]] {{gloss|opposite of theory}} #: ''In der '''Praxis''' kommt das selten vor.'' #:: That rarely ever occurs in '''practice'''. # [[surgery]] (''UK''), [[doctor]]'s [[office]] (''US'') {{gloss|workplace of a self-employed doctor}} #: ''Mein Zahnarzt hat viele Blumen in der '''Praxis'''.'' #:: My dentist has a lot of flowers in his '''surgery'''. ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|praxisfern}} * {{l|de|praxisfremd}} * {{l|de|praxisnah}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
